author: DistroTube
description:
A channel introduction video is a nice thing to have for YouTube, Patreon, etc. I haven't done one of these in awhile so here is a quick video introducing the channel and what it's all about. Although this is more than just a quick introduction. This is a lengthy story of my computing journey and how I discovered Linux and free software.

WANT TO SUPPORT THE CHANNEL?

title: My Origin Story...How I Found Linux!
